trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Import-LocalizedData
trans-unit.target: Import-localizeddata

trans-unit.source: Import-LocalizedData
trans-unit.target: Import-localizeddata

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Imports language-specific data into scripts and functions based on the UI culture that is selected for the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 根據為作業系統選取的 UI 文化特性，將語言特定資料匯入指令碼和函式。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Import-LocalizedData** cmdlet dynamically retrieves strings from a subdirectory whose name matches the UI language set for the current user of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Import-localizeddata** 指令程式從其名稱符合目前使用者的作業系統設定的 UI 語言的子目錄動態擷取字串。

trans-unit.source: It is designed to enable scripts to display user messages in the UI language selected by the current user.
trans-unit.target: 它是專為讓指令碼以目前使用者選取的 UI 語言顯示使用者訊息而設計。

trans-unit.source: **Import-LocalizedData** imports data from .psd1 files in language-specific subdirectories of the script directory and saves them in a local variable that is specified in the command.
trans-unit.target: **Import-localizeddata** 從語言特定子目錄的指令碼目錄中的.psd1 檔案匯入資料，並將它們儲存在命令中指定的本機變數。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet selects the subdirectory and file based on the value of the $PSUICulture automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 Cmdlet 會根據 $PSUICulture 自動變數的值來選取子目錄和檔案。

trans-unit.source: When you use the local variable in the script to display a user message, the message appears in the user's UI language.
trans-unit.target: 在指令碼中使用區域變數來顯示使用者訊息時，訊息會以使用者的 UI 語言顯示。

trans-unit.source: You can use the parameters of **Import-LocalizedData** to specify an alternate UI culture, path, and file name, to add supported commands, and to suppress the error message that appears if the .psd1 files are not found.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的參數 **Import-localizeddata** 來指定替代的 UI 文化特性、 路徑和檔案名稱，新增支援的命令，以及抑制找不到.psd1 檔案時，會出現錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The **Import-LocalizedData** cmdlet supports the script internationalization initiative that was introduced in Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: **Import-localizeddata** 指令程式支援在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 引進了指令碼國際化計畫。

trans-unit.source: This initiative aims to better serve users worldwide by making it easy for scripts to display user messages in the UI language of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 這個計畫的目標是要藉由讓指令碼能輕鬆以目前使用者的 UI 語言顯示使用者訊息，為世界各地的使用者提供更好的服務。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this and about the format of the .psd1 files, see about_Script_Internationalization (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113262).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這和.psd1 檔案格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Script_Internationalization (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113262)。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command imports text strings into the $Messages variable.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會將文字字串匯入到 $Messages 變數中。

trans-unit.source: It uses the default values of all other cmdlet parameters.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用所有其他 Cmdlet 參數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: If the command is included in the Archives.ps1 script in the C:\Test directory, and the value of the $PsUICulture automatic variable is zh-CN, **Import-LocalizedData** imports the Archives.psd1 file in the C:\test\zh-CN directory into the $Messages variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果此命令包含在 C:\Test 目錄下的 Archives.ps1 指令碼中，而且 $PsUICulture 自動變數的值是 ZH-CN **Import-localizeddata** 中將 C:\test\zh-CN 目錄下的 Archives.psd1 檔案匯入 $Messages 變數。

trans-unit.source: This command is run at the command line; not in a script.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令是在命令列中執行；不是在指令碼中執行。

trans-unit.source: It gets localized data strings from the Test.psd1 file and displays them at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 它會從 Test.psd1 檔案取得當地語系化資料字串，並在命令列中顯示這些字串。

trans-unit.source: Because the command is not used in a script, the **FileName** parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不會在指令碼，因為 **FileName** 是必要參數。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the **UICuture** parameter to specify the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **UICuture** 參數來指定 EN-US 文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Import-LocalizedData returns a hash table that contains the localized data strings.
trans-unit.target: Import-LocalizedData 會傳回一個包含當地語系化資料字串的雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: This command imports text strings into the $msgTbl variable of a script.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會將文字字串匯入到指令碼的 $msgTbl 變數中。

trans-unit.source: It uses the **UICulture** parameter to direct the cmdlet to import data from the Simple.psd1 file in the ar-SA subdirectory of C:\Data\Localized.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 **UICulture** 參數，指示 cmdlet 從 C:\Data\Localized AR-SA 子目錄中的 Simple.psd1 檔案匯入資料。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use localized data in a simple script.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何在簡單的指令碼中使用當地語系化資料。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the example shows the contents of the Test.psd1 file.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的第一個部分示範 Test.psd1 檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: It contains a ConvertFrom-StringData command that converts a series of named text strings into a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 它包含可將一系列具名的文字字串轉換成雜湊表的 Convertfrom-stringdata 命令。

trans-unit.source: The Test.psd1 file is located in the en-US subdirectory of the C:\Test directory that contains the script.
trans-unit.target: Test.psd1 檔案位於包含指令碼之 C:\Test 目錄的 en-US 子目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example shows the contents of the Test.ps1 script.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的第二個部分示範 Test.ps1 指令碼的內容。

trans-unit.source: It contains an **Import-LocalizedData** command that imports the data from the matching .psd1 file into the $Messages variable and a Write-Host command that writes one of the messages in the $Messages variable to the host program.
trans-unit.target: 它包含 **Import-localizeddata** 從對應的.psd1 檔案將資料匯入至 $Messages 變數和訊息寫入主機程式 $Messages 變數中的 Write-host 命令的命令。

trans-unit.source: The last part of the example runs the script.
trans-unit.target: 此範例的最後一個部分會執行指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The output shows that it displays the correct user message in the UI language set for the current user of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此輸出顯示它使用了為作業系統目前使用者設定的 UI 語言顯示正確的使用者訊息。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use **Import-LocalizedData** to replace default text strings defined in the DATA section of a script.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用 **Import-localizeddata** 來取代指令碼的資料區段中定義的預設文字字串。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the DATA section of the TestScript.ps1 script contains a ConvertFrom-StringData command that converts the contents of the DATA section to a hash table and stores in the value of the $UserMessages variable.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，TestScript.ps1 指令碼的 [資料] 區段包含 Convertfrom-stringdata 命令，將 [資料] 區段的內容轉換成雜湊表，並將 $UserMessages 變數的值。

trans-unit.source: The script also includes an **Import-LocalizedData** command, which imports a hash table of translated text strings from the TestScript.psd1 file in the subdirectory specified by the value of the $PsUICulture variable.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼也包含 **Import-localizeddata** 命令，從 $PsUICulture 變數的值所指定的子目錄中的 TestScript.psd1 檔案匯入翻譯的文字字串的雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: If the command finds the .psd1 file, it saves the translated strings from the file in the value of the same $UserMessages variable, overwriting the hash table saved by the DATA section logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果此命令找到 .psd1 檔案，它就會將來自檔案的已翻譯字串儲存在相同 $UserMessages 變數的值中，覆寫 DATA 區段邏輯所儲存的雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: The third command displays the first message in the $UserMessages variable.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令會顯示 $UserMessages 變數中的第一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the **Import-LocalizedData** command finds a .psd1 file for the $PsUICulture language, the value of the $UserMessages variable contains the translated text strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果 **Import-localizeddata** 命令找到 $PsUICulture 語言的.psd1 檔案時，$UserMessages 變數的值包含翻譯的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: If the command fails for any reason, the command displays the default text strings defined in the DATA section of the script.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令因任何原因而失敗，此命令便會顯示指令碼之 DATA 區段中定義的預設文字字串。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to suppress the error messages that appear when **Import-LocalizedData** cannot find the directories that match the user's UI culture or cannot find a .psd1 file for the script in those directories.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何隱藏時出現的錯誤訊息 **Import-localizeddata** 找不到的目錄，以符合使用者的 UI 文化特性或這些目錄中找不到指令碼的.psd1 檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **ErrorAction** common parameter with a value of **SilentlyContinue** to suppress the error message.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **ErrorAction** 一般參數值是 **SilentlyContinue** 來隱藏錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: This is especially useful when you have provided user messages in a default or "fallback" language, and no error message is needed.
trans-unit.target: 當您已用預設語言或「遞補」語言提供使用者訊息，而不需要任何錯誤訊息時，這會特別有用。

trans-unit.source: This example compares two scripts, Day1.ps1 and Day2.ps1, that include an **Import-LocalizedData** command.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會比較兩個指令碼︰ Day1.ps1 和 Day2.ps1 包含 **Import-localizeddata** 命令。

trans-unit.source: The scripts are identical, except that Day2 uses the **ErrorAction** common parameter with a value of **SilentlyContinue**.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼是以完全相同，除了 Day2 使用 **ErrorAction** 一般參數值是 **SilentlyContinue**。

trans-unit.source: The sample output shows the results of running both scripts when the UI culture is set to fr-BE and there are no matching files or directories for that UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 此範例輸出顯示當 UI 文化特性設定為 fr-BE 而沒有與此 UI 文化特性相符的檔案或目錄時，這兩個指令碼的執行結果。

trans-unit.source: Day1.ps1 displays an error message and English output.
trans-unit.target: Day1.ps1 會顯示錯誤訊息和英文輸出。

trans-unit.source: Day2.ps1 just displays the English output.
trans-unit.target: Day2.ps1 只會顯示英文輸出。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -BaseDirectory
trans-unit.target: -BaseDirectory

trans-unit.source: Specifies the base directory where the .psd1 files are located.
trans-unit.target: 指定 .psd1 檔案所在位置的基礎目錄。

trans-unit.source: The default is the directory where the script is located.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是指令碼所在的目錄。

trans-unit.source: **Import-LocalizedData** searches for the .psd1 file for the script in a language-specific subdirectory of the base directory.
trans-unit.target: **Import-localizeddata** 搜尋的語言特定子目錄的基底目錄中的指令碼的.psd1 檔案。

trans-unit.source: -BindingVariable
trans-unit.target: -BindingVariable

trans-unit.source: Specifies the variable into which the text strings are imported.
trans-unit.target: 指定做為文字字串匯入位置的變數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable name without a dollar sign ($).
trans-unit.target: 請輸入沒有貨幣符號 ($) 的變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，這是必要參數。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 3.0, this parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中，這是選擇性參數。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, **Import-LocalizedData** returns a hash table of the text strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果您省略這個參數， **Import-localizeddata** 傳回文字字串的雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: The hash table is passed down the pipeline or displayed at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊表會沿著管線向下傳遞或在命令列中顯示。

trans-unit.source: When using **Import-LocalizedData** to replace default text strings specified in the DATA section of a script, assign the DATA section to a variable and enter the name of the DATA section variable in the value of the **BindingVariable** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 **Import-localizeddata** 來取代指令碼的 [資料] 區段中指定的預設文字字串，指派給變數資料區段，並輸入值的資料區段變數的名稱 **BindingVariable** 參數。

trans-unit.source: Then, when **Import-LocalizedData** saves the imported content in the **BindingVariable**, the imported data will replace the default text strings.
trans-unit.target: 然後，當 **Import-localizeddata** 儲存匯入的內容中 **BindingVariable**, ，匯入的資料將會取代預設文字字串。

trans-unit.source: If you are not specifying default text strings, you can select any variable name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定預設的文字字串，則可選取任何變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: -FileName
trans-unit.target: -檔案名稱

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the data file (.psd1) to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 指定要匯入之資料檔 (.psd1) 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Enter a file name.
trans-unit.target: 請輸入檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a file name that does not include its .psd1 file name extension, or you can specify the file name including the .psd1 file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定不包含 .psd1 副檔名的檔案名稱，也可以指定包含 .psd1 副檔名的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The **FileName** parameter is required when **Import-LocalizedData** is not used in a script.
trans-unit.target: **FileName** 參數時，需要 **Import-localizeddata** 不是在指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the parameter is optional and the default value is the base name of the script.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個參數為選用參數，而預設值為指令碼的主檔名。

trans-unit.source: You can use this parameter to direct **Import-LocalizedData** to search for a different .psd1 file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個參數來指示 **Import-localizeddata** 搜尋不同的.psd1 檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Filename is omitted and the script name is FindFiles.ps1, **Import-LocalizedData** searches for the FindFiles.psd1 data file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果省略檔案和指令碼名稱為 FindFiles.ps1， **Import-localizeddata** 搜尋 FindFiles.psd1 資料檔。

trans-unit.source: -SupportedCommand
trans-unit.target: -SupportedCommand

trans-unit.source: Specifies cmdlets and functions that generate only data.
trans-unit.target: 指定只產生資料的 Cmdlet 和函式。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter to include cmdlets and functions that you have written or tested.
trans-unit.target: 請使用這個參數來包含您已經撰寫或測試的 Cmdlet 和函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Script_Internationalization.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Script_Internationalization。

trans-unit.source: -UICulture
trans-unit.target: -UICulture

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternate UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 指定替代的 UI 文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the $PsUICulture automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 $PsUICulture 自動變數的值。

trans-unit.source: Enter a UI culture in "\<language\>-\<region\>" format, such as en-US, de-DE, or ar-SA.
trans-unit.target: 輸入中的 UI 文化特性 」\<語言\>-\<區域\>」 的格式，例如 EN-US、 DE-DE 或 AR-SA。

trans-unit.source: The value of the **UICulture** parameter determines the language-specific subdirectory (within the base directory) from which **Import-LocalizedData** gets the .psd1 file for the script.
trans-unit.target: 值 **UICulture** 參數會決定 （在基底目錄中） 的語言特定子目錄從中 **Import-localizeddata** 取得指令碼的.psd1 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet searches for a subdirectory with the same name as the value of the **UICulture** parameter or the $PsUICulture automatic variable, such as "de-DE" or "ar-SA".
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 會搜尋的子目錄名稱的值與相同 **UICulture** 參數或 $PsUICulture 自動變數，例如"DE-DE"或"AR-SA"。

trans-unit.source: If it cannot find the directory, or the directory does not contain a .psd1 file for the script, it searches for a subdirectory with the name of the language code, such as "de" or "ar".
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到目錄，或目錄未包含指令碼的 .psd1 檔案，它就會搜尋具有語言代碼之名稱 (例如 "de" 或 "ar") 的子目錄。

trans-unit.source: If it cannot find the subdirectory or .psd1 file, the command fails and the data is displayed in the default language specified in the script.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到子目錄或 .psd1 檔案，則命令會失敗，資料會以指令碼中指定的預設語言顯示。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Collections.Hashtable
trans-unit.target: System.Collections.Hashtable

trans-unit.source: **Import-LocalizedData** saves the hash table in the variable that is specified by the value of the **BindingVariable** parameter.
trans-unit.target: **Import-localizeddata** 的值所指定的變數中儲存的雜湊表 **BindingVariable** 參數。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: Before using **Import-LocalizedData**, localize your user messages.
trans-unit.target: 使用之前 **Import-localizeddata**, ，當地語系化使用者訊息。

trans-unit.source: Format the messages for each locale (UI culture) in a hash table of key/value pairs, and save the hash table in a file with the same name as the script and a .psd1 file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 在機碼/值組的雜湊表中，將每個地區設定 (UI 文化特性) 的訊息格式化，並將此雜湊表儲存在與指令碼同名且副檔名為 .psd1 的檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Create a directory under the script directory for each supported UI culture, and then save the .psd1 file for each UI culture in the directory with the UI culture name.
trans-unit.target: 在指令碼目錄下為每個支援的 UI 文化特性建立一個目錄，然後將每個 UI 文化特性的.psd1 檔案以 UI 文化特性名稱儲存在目錄中。

trans-unit.source: For example, localize your user messages for the de-DE locale and format them in a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將您的使用者訊息針對 de-DE 地區設定翻譯成當地語言，然後在雜湊表中格式化。

trans-unit.source: Save the hash table in a \<ScriptName\>.psd1 file.
trans-unit.target: 儲存的雜湊資料表中 \<ScriptName\>.psd1 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Then create a de-DE subdirectory under the script directory, and save the de-DE \<ScriptName\>.psd1 file in the de-DE subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立指令碼目錄下的 DE-DE 子目錄，並將儲存 DE-DE \<ScriptName\>DE-DE 子目錄中的.psd1 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Repeat this method for each locale that you support.
trans-unit.target: 針對您支援的每個地區設定重複使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: **Import-LocalizedData** performs a structured search for the localized user messages for a script.
trans-unit.target: **Import-localizeddata** 執行指令碼之當地語系化的使用者訊息的結構化的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: **Import-LocalizedData** begins the search in the directory where the script file is located (or the value of the **BaseDirectory** parameter).
trans-unit.target: **Import-localizeddata** 指令碼檔案所在的目錄中開始搜尋 (或值的 **BaseDirectory** 參數)。

trans-unit.source: It then searches within the base directory for a subdirectory with the same name as the value of the $PsUICulture variable (or the value of the **UICulture** parameter), such as "de-DE" or "ar-SA".
trans-unit.target: 然後搜尋中的基底目錄的子目錄 $PsUICulture 變數的值相同的名稱 (或值的 **UICulture** 參數)，例如"DE-DE"或"AR-SA"。

trans-unit.source: Then, it searches in that subdirectory for a .psd1 file with the same name as the script (or the value of the **FileName** parameter).
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會搜尋具有相同名稱與指令碼的.psd1 檔案的子目錄中 (或值的 **FileName** 參數)。

trans-unit.source: If **Import-LocalizedData** cannot find a subdirectory with the name of the UI culture, or the subdirectory does not contain a .psd1 file for the script, it searches for a .psd1 file for the script in a subdirectory with the name of the language code, such as "de" or "ar".
trans-unit.target: 如果 **Import-localizeddata** UI 文化特性名稱的子目錄或子目錄未包含指令碼的.psd1 檔案，它會搜尋具有語言代碼，例如"de"或"ar"之名稱的子目錄中的指令碼的.psd1 檔案，找不到。

trans-unit.source: If it cannot find the subdirectory or .psd1 file, the command fails, the data is displayed in the default language in the script, and an error message is displayed explaining that the data could not be imported.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到子目錄或 .psd1 檔案，則命令會失敗，資料會以指令碼中的預設語言顯示，並且會顯示一則錯誤訊息，說明無法匯入資料。

trans-unit.source: To suppress the message and fail gracefully, use the **ErrorAction** common parameter with a value of **SilentlyContinue**.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏訊息，並依正常程序失敗，使用 **ErrorAction** 一般參數值是 **SilentlyContinue**。

trans-unit.source: If **Import-LocalizedData** finds the subdirectory and the .psd1 file, it imports the hash table of user messages into the value of the **BindingVariable** parameter in the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果 **Import-localizeddata** 找到子目錄和.psd1 檔案，它將使用者訊息的雜湊表匯入的值 **BindingVariable** 命令中的參數。

trans-unit.source: Then, when you display a message from the hash table in the variable, the localized message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 然後，當您從變數中的雜湊表顯示訊息時，就會顯示已翻譯成當地語言的訊息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Script_Internationalization (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113262).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Script_Internationalization (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113262)。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.source: about_Script_Internationalization
trans-unit.target: about_Script_Internationalization
